snippet: Scientists have made a vibrating bridgelike device millionths of a meter long that changes frequency when a molecule arrives; the change is measured to determine the molecule’s mass.
abstract: Dr Michael Roukes study in journal Nature Nanotechnology reports the development of a device that, for the first time, can measure the mass of a single molecule.
lead_paragraph: Scientists have made a vibrating bridgelike device millionths of a meter long that changes frequency when a molecule arrives; the change is measured to determine the molecule’s mass.

headline.print_headline: Taking the Measure Of a Single Molecule
headline.seo: Nano Device Can Measure Mass of a Single Molecule
headline.main: Taking the Measure of a Single Molecule
